root.name: Fish!
root.description: Overview In Fish! the player plays as an experienced espionage agent who has the power to warp into the body of any living thing and travel between dimensions. The agent is on a vacation from work in the body of a goldfish when a terrorist group known as The Seven Deadly Fins surface, attempting to destroy all forms of life and he is drafted to stop them. Before the player can reach Hydropolis they must collect together three parts which can be assembled into a warp device. Collecting each part requires completing a mission within the game. Throughout the game the player's form changes between human and fish. Some versions of the game have still graphics accompanying the text.
